Use (English): Plant with faith, water with hope, and harvest with love.

Name: organic farming
Use (English): Organic farming avoids chemicals and uses natural fertilizers like compost and manure.

Name: best season for rice
Use (English): Rice grows best in Kharif season (June–November) with high rainfall.

Name: best season for wheat
Use (English): Wheat grows in Rabi season (October–March) in cooler climates.

Name: best season for tomato
Use (English): Tomatoes grow well in summer and need well-drained soil with moderate watering.

Name: fertilizer for yield
Use (English): Use NPK (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium) mix to improve yield.

Name: crop rotation
Use (English): Rotating crops improves soil fertility and reduces pest attack.

Name: intercropping
Use (English): Planting marigold with tomato helps repel pests naturally.

Name: rain
Use (English): Too much rain causes waterlogging — use proper drainage systems.

Use (English): In summer, drip irrigation saves water and boosts yield.

Use (English): Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field 😆.

Use (English): Good source of phosphorus and nitrogen.

Use (English): Saves water and increases productivity.

Name: Sprinkler irrigation

Name: Maize
Use (English): Grows well in well-drained loamy soil with warm weather (21–27°C).

Name: Sugarcane

Use (English): Grows in loamy or clayey soil; ideal temperature is 20–30°C.

Name: Jowar (Sorghum)
